name: chainlink-deploy
description: This tool is helpful to manage a local Chainlink node

scripts.start:chainlink: docker run --platform linux/x86_64/v8 --name chainlink -v ./chainlink:/chainlink -it -p 6688:6688 --add-host=host.docker.internal:host-gateway smartcontract/chainlink:2.20.0 node -config /chainlink/config.toml -secrets /chainlink/secrets.toml start
scripts.restart:chainlink: docker stop chainlink && docker rm chainlink && npm run start:chainlink

author: koteld
